channel.title: Errors?!
channel.description:
I need to know why Moparscape is giving me errors I don't understand.
Here is a list I have recieved. (GAMEWISE)
Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 18,0,0 - 67,111,109,98,97,116,32,76,101,118,101,108,58,32,48,10,78,-97, (I get this error normally on GrinderScape)
An unexpected error has occurred. (Why does this happen almost all of the time?)
Invalid username or password. (Umm..)
Message telling me I HAVE TO BE A MEMBER to play on this server. (Ok then..)
Error connecting to server. Must be down. (Yea, right, when I log out to go do something, 1 minute later the server is down?)
ERROR CREATING MY OWN SERVER (I'd like an explanation to THIS.)
If a moderatior can answer my questions I would be happy.

item.title: Errors?!
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 18,0,0 - 67,111,109,98,97,116,32,76,101,118,101,108,58,32,48,10,78,-97,

the error itself just means: “You need our client to be able to play on our server otherwise you’ll disconnect when you try to connect.”
for example: “You need the Grinderscape Client to be able to play on grinderscape otherwise you’ll disconnect when you try to connect.”

i still gotta figure out (or be learned i hope someone knows how to delete that from a server so everyone can join, with or without my client :()

Read full topic

item.title: Errors?!
item.dc:creator: @Player_4 Player 4
item.description:
@Player_4 wrote:

TabbyKiller:

It isn’t MoparScape giving you errors, its either you’re Computer or You did something wrong.

I did nothing wrong, I’ll try to go on PVP 24-7 Webclient and these errors pop up. The Error T2 happens mostly on Grinderscape, it’ll log me out when it logs me IN.

I am using a Dimension E510 from Windows XP. I just got a new hard-drive but that doesn’t tell me anything, since I have clients.

And how do I do anything wrong? I try to go on and it kicks me off.

Read full topic

I need to know why Moparscape is giving me errors I don’t understand.
